title: IT Support Technician
description:
**Are you the person people turn to when their tech misbehaves? Do you enjoy solving problems, helping others, and exploring the mysteries of networking, hardware, and software? Whether you’re early in your IT journey or a seasoned support hero, this might be your next quest.**
 We’re looking for a curious, socially skilled, and tech-passionate
 **IT Support Technician** 
 to join our Stockholm HQ. At Paradox, support isn’t just about fixing things, it’s about enabling people to do their best work.
   

  

**Your Mission**
 You’ll be a key player in our internal IT team, providing hands-on and remote support across Windows, macOS, and Linux systems. You’ll help onboard new colleagues, manage hardware/software, keep our IT environment secure and stable and occasionally rescue a meeting by reviving the speaker system from the frozen plains.
   

  

**What You’ll Do**
* Provide daily IT support to employees (hardware, software, services)
* Troubleshoot and resolve incidents both on-site and remotely
* Onboard/offboard users and manage accounts and devices
* Maintain conference rooms and other office IT systems
* Support projects to improve and scale our IT infrastructure


**About You**
 You’re a service-minded techie who communicates well, enjoys teamwork, and thrives in dynamic environments. You’re curious by nature and love learning new things as well as explaining them without sounding like a robot.
   

  

**Must-haves**
* A genuine interest in tech and helping others
* Strong communication skills in English
* Curiosity, accountability, and initiative


**Bonus If You Know**
* Windows Server, Active Directory
* Entra ID, Okta, Google Workspace
* Linux/macOS, networking basics, scripting (Python/Bash/Powershell)
* Ticketing systems (Freshservice, JIRA, etc.)


**About The Team**
 Paradox IT consists of two tightly connected teams -
 **IT Support** 
 and
 **IT Operations** 
 - currently eight people strong. While you’ll officially be part of the IT Support team, your work may span across both sides of IT and connect with many departments throughout the company.
   

  

**Practical Info**
* Location: Stockholm (on-site)
* Scope: Full-time, permanent
* Reports to: Head of IT
* Please note: We do not offer relocation assistance for this position.


**If you’re ready to level up your IT support skills in a place where curiosity is valued, teamwork is second nature, and every tech fix is part of the bigger game - apply now. Let’s shape the future of IT at Paradox together.**
 Today, Paradox consists of both publishing and internal game development. We have a broad portfolio of games and own the most important brands, including Stellaris, Europa Universalis, Hearts of Iron, Crusader Kings, Cities: Skylines, Prison Architect, Victoria, Age of Wonders and the World of Darkness catalog of brands.
   

  

 Since 2004, the company has published its games all over the world, initially through physical distribution but primarily in digital channels after 2006. Paradox games are developed primarily for PC and console platforms, but the company also releases games on mobile. The largest markets today include the US, UK, China, Germany, France and Scandinavia. In total, Paradox games have over five million players each month.

title: IT Operations Manager
description:
**Vill du vara med och säkra driften när vi formar framtidens försäkringsmarknad?** 




  





 Eir är ett digitalt försäkringsbolag grundat i Norden som sedan starten 2019 har utmanat en traditionstyngd bransch. Vi är helt digitala, transparenta och drivs av effektiva processer. Genom vår egenutvecklade cloud-native IT-miljö och öppna API:er utvecklar vi flexibla försäkringserbjudanden tillsammans med våra partners i stora delar av Europa. 
 



  





 Nu söker vi en IT Operations Manager som vill vara med och bygga en trygg, stabil och skalbar driftmiljö – samtidigt som vi vidareutvecklar våra processer med innovation och automatisering i fokus.Du blir en del av ett engagerat och kompetent team i Stockholm, med nära samarbete över landsgränserna – i en verksamhet där teknik och innovation är centralt i allt vi gör.
 



  





**Om rollen** 




  





 Som
 **IT Operations Manager** 
 har du en central, operativ roll i vår IT-organisation. Du ansvarar för att plattformen är tillgänglig och stabil, att incidenter hanteras snabbt och att kommunikationen – både internt och externt – är tydlig. Du fungerar som en samordnande kraft i teamet och är med och sätter struktur i våra arbetssätt, driver förbättringsinitiativ och coachar dina kollegor i en miljö där teknik och samarbete står i centrum.
 



  





**Huvudsakliga ansvarsområden:** 




  




* Hantera kontoadministration och onboarding i våra IT-system
* Säkerställa monitorering av system och loggar samt koordinera incidenthantering: leda insatser, samla rätt resurser och kommunicera effektivt
* Driva förbättringar i arbetsprocesser, kravhantering och teamets samarbete
* Vara ett stöd till utvecklings- och supportteamet i både operativa frågor och processutveckling.



  





**Vi söker dig som är:** 




  




* **Teknikintresserad** 
 – du har utbildning eller erfarenhet inom IT och känner dig hemma i en digital miljö
* **Kunnig om försäkring** 
 - erfarenhet från försäkringsbranschen är ett krav i denna roll
* **En duktig kommunikatör** 
 – du har lätt för att fånga upp behov, förklara tekniska frågor på ett tydligt sätt och växla mellan utvecklarspråk och affärsspråk – på både svenska och engelska
* **Coachande, strukturerad och lösningsorienterad –** 
 du får energi av att skapa ordning, bygga förtroende och lösa problem
* **Nyfiken och förändringsbenägen** 
  – du trivs i miljöer där saker förändras, och vågar utmana gamla arbetssätt eller föreslå nya



  





 Bonus om du är nyfiken på AI och dess möjligheter i moderna IT-miljöer. 
 



  





**Praktisk information:** 




 ﻿
 



**Placering:** 
 Stockholm/Hybrid
 



**Tjänst:** 
 IT Operations Manager, Heltid
 



**Sista ansökningsdag:** 
 2025-09-05
 



**Kontakt:** 
 Har du frågor? Hör gärna av dig till Petronella.groth@eirforsakring.se
 



  





 Urval sker löpande – tjänsten tillsätts så snart vi hittar rätt person.
 



  





 Välkommen med din ansökan– och bli en del av Eir när vi förändrar försäkringsvärlden!!

title: IT-chef
description:
**Brandkontoret söker IT-chef – en strategisk ledare med hjärta för teknik och samhällsnytta** 




 Vill du vara med och forma framtidens IT i ett av Sveriges äldsta försäkringsbolag? Nu söker vi på Brandkontoret en
 **IT-chef** 
 som kan leda vår digitala utveckling med strategisk skärpa och operativ handlingskraft.
 



 📍
 **Placering** 
 : Stockholm
 



 📆
 **Tillträde** 
 : Senast vid årsskiftet 2025/2026
 



 🕒
 **Anställningsform** 
 : Tillsvidare, heltid
 



  





**Om rollen** 




 Som IT-chef blir du en central del av Brandkontorets ledningsgrupp. Du ansvarar för hela vårt IT-område – från infrastruktur, systemutveckling och IT-säkerhet till governance, upphandlingar och budget. Rollen innebär både strategiskt ledarskap och operativt arbete – ibland även kodning (C#, SQL, Java, JavaScript).
 



 Du kommer att ha nyckelroll i det pågående teknikskiftet från Visual Basic till modernare miljöer. Du samverkar nära vd, försäkringsverksamheten, ekonomi, compliance och externa partners.
 



  





**Vem är du?** 




 Vi söker dig med:
 


* Minst 10 års erfarenhet av ledande IT-roller inom finanssektorn
* Akademisk utbildning inom IT samt gärna inom ledarskap och IT-säkerhet
* God förmåga att jobba både strategiskt och operativt
* Kunskap om reglering som till exempel DORA
* Mycket god svenska och engelska



 Du är
 **resultatorienterad** 
 ,
 **strukturerad** 
 och gillar att
 **samarbeta** 
 – och du gillar att arbeta i en verksamhet med stolta traditioner och stark samhällsnytta.
 



  





**Varför Brandkontoret?** 




 Vi är ett litet och modernt försäkringsbolag med historiska rötter – här får du en chans att påverka både teknik och kultur. Vi tror på långsiktighet och nära samarbete.
 



  





**Kontakt** 



* För ansökan skicka personligt brev och CV till jesper.andersson@brandkontoret.se. Vi utvärderar löpande kandidater och sista ansökningsdagen är 2025-08-31.

title: IT Service Manager
description:
**Do you have a knack for bringing order to chaos, a natural sense for coordination, and a curious mind that always wants to know how things can be done better? If you’re part strategist, part problem-solver, and all about good teamwork - your next quest might start here.**
 At Paradox Interactive, our worlds are filled with rich stories, strategic depth, and passionate communities. Behind the scenes, our IT department ensures the gears keep turning. We’re now looking for an
 **IT Service Manager** 
 to join the party - someone who can help us grow and improve how we deliver internal IT services across the company.
   

  

**Your Mission**
 As
 **IT Service Manager** 
 , you’ll play a pivotal role in our IT Operations team, while also bridging collaboration with IT Support and other departments. You’ll be responsible for the service catalog, guiding the evolution of IT service delivery, and bringing structure to both recurring tasks and project-based adventures.
   

  

 Whether it’s improving how we handle requests, supporting tool rollouts, or helping teams understand what’s available to them - you’ll make sure IT is a dependable and well-understood companion on everyone’s journey.
   

  

**You’ll Be Doing Things Like**
* Maintaining and improving the IT service catalog and service-related processes
* Leading project work through coordination, documentation, and follow-up
* Analyzing service metrics and identifying ways to improve delivery
* Acting as a liaison between IT Support and IT Operations to handle cross-functional needs
* Collaborating with other departments to align IT services with company needs
* Proposing new tools or processes where you see potential for better efficiency or clarity


**About You**
 You see the value in both planning and improvising. You enjoy connecting dots, aligning teams, and clarifying the “how” and “why” behind what we do. Most of all, you’re curious - you ask questions, explore possibilities, and love helping others find better ways of working.
   

  

**Your Skillset Includes**
* A solid background in IT support or IT service delivery
* Familiarity with frameworks like ITIL (or similar)
* Experience with ticketing systems (e.g. Freshservice, Jira, or ServiceNow)
* Documentation skills and a methodical approach to process improvement
* Project management or project coordination experience
* Strong communication skills, both written and verbal. English is our primary work language.
* Curious, inquisitive and customer focused mindset
* Strong sense of accountability and ownership


 You’re comfortable switching between structured plans and ad-hoc problem-solving. You care about getting things done - but also
 *how* 
 they’re done, and how to make them better next time.
   

  

**About The Team**
 Paradox IT consists of two tightly connected teams -
 **IT Support** 
 and
 **IT Operations** 
 - currently eight people strong. While you’ll officially be part of the IT Operations team, your work will span across both sides of IT and connect with many departments throughout the company. Think of it as a hub role in a highly collaborative network.
   

  

**If you’re ready to level up your service delivery skills in a place where curiosity is encouraged, collaboration is key, and the tech is part of the adventure - apply now. Let’s write the next chapter of IT at Paradox together.**
 Today, Paradox consists of both publishing and internal game development. We have a broad portfolio of games and own the most important brands, including Stellaris, Europa Universalis, Hearts of Iron, Crusader Kings, Cities: Skylines, Prison Architect, Victoria, Age of Wonders and the World of Darkness catalog of brands.
   

  

 Since 2004, the company has published its games all over the world, initially through physical distribution but primarily in digital channels after 2006. Paradox games are developed primarily for PC and console platforms, but the company also releases games on mobile. The largest markets today include the US, UK, China, Germany, France and Scandinavia. In total, Paradox games have over five million players each month.

title: Onsite Support
description:
Location : Stockholm Sweden
   

  

 Years of Experience : Min. 5+ Years
   

  

 100% Onsite
   

  

 Language :Swedish Optional and English Advance.
   

  

**Job Description**
* Provide Level 1 and 2 technical supports for end-user devices, including desktops, laptops, monitors, printers, mobile phones, and tablets.
* Install, configure, maintain, and troubleshoot operating systems (Windows, macOS) and standard software applications (e.g., MS Office, VPN, collaboration tools).
* Set up and provision new employee devices, including imaging, software installation, and user access configuration.
* Support user account management activities such as password resets, permissions changes, and onboarding/offboarding processes.
* Maintain asset inventory by tagging, tracking, and updating device information in asset management systems.
* Resolve incidents and service requests via IT ticketing systems (e.g., ServiceNow, Jira).
* Coordinate with vendors and third-party providers for device repairs, warranty claims, and support escalations.
* Educate and assist users in best practices for device usage, data security, and software tools.
* Participate in IT projects including hardware refreshes, rollouts, and system upgrades.
* Maintain documentation of on-site activities and update relevant systems or tickets.
* Strong communication skills and ability to follow detailed technical instructions.
* Ensure all tasks comply with IT security and data protection policies.


**Skills**
**Soft Skills**
* Ability to communicate professionally and effectively, both orally and in writing.
* Excellent interpersonal skills.
* Ability to work in a fast-paced, high-pressure, dynamic, and global environment


**Required Qualifications**
* Bachelor's degree in information technology, Business Administration, or related field (or equivalent experience).
* Certifications such as CompTIA A+, Microsoft Certified: Modern Desktop Administrator, or ITIL Foundation.
* Strong knowledge of Windows and macOS environments.
* Experience with Microsoft 365, Active Directory, and remote support tools (e.g., TeamViewer, AnyDesk).
* Basic networking knowledge (TCP/IP, DHCP, DNS) and troubleshooting skills.
* Excellent communication, customer service, and problem-solving skills.

title: (Part-time) IT Business Partner Supply Chain & Warehouse
description:
We are looking for a IT Business Partner Supply Chain for our region Central & Northern Europe. The role will report to IT Associate Director C&NE and could be based in Filipstad, Stockholm or Celle. This position is currently planned as a
 
 part-time position
 
 (20 hours / week – 2 -3 days per week) for 12 months.
 



  





**Job purpose:** 




 The IT Business Partner ensures and executes the development of programs for local and global IT solutions used locally for Purchasing, Plant Maintenance, Manufacturing and Warehousing in the factories in Filipstad and Celle in line with the Group´s IT guidelines and IT security policies. S/he guarantees a smooth running of the IT systems for the whole Plant Organization (Manufacturing, Maintenance, Warehouse, Purchasing) as well as HR in C&NE. S/he will be working in strong cooperation with local functions and central IT functions (UHD, IT Infrastructure, Architecture & Cybersecurity e.g.)
 



  





**Key Accountabilities:** 



* Keep the close contact to local functions, Process Owners, Key Users as well as central IT functions, proposing initiatives and ensuring that user´s requests are received and transformed into planning activities in line with the IT strategy plan
* Collaborate with the Regional Business Partner in the identification of user needs for improvement or increase in systems capacity in the Plant, in order to increase level of efficiency, effectiveness, quality and operational functionality
* Ensuring alignment with the strategic / operational IT plan and the agreed priorities, as well as updating and maintenance of the existing systems and operative processes, coordinating the execution and upgrading plans and programs in line with the predefined priorities and the timing and costs agreed
* Ensure the development, functionality, maintenance and service level of applications software specific to region C&NE where these are not centralized at a Group Level, through planning, organizing and coordinating internal and external resources respecting the defined budget.
* In case of specific local requested software applications ensure that the solutions defined are fitting to the requirements and into application landscape as well as that the project approval & implementation are coherent with IT Governance in all phases of the process, from initial approval to follow-up and final user acceptance.
* Participate in standardization / rationalization projects for the Group´s systems, collaborating with involved functions – analyze the impact on organization and local processes, accompany implementation and monitoring of software solution
* Ensure and coordinate timely technical assistance both through user support activities and through maintenance support of used software systems respecting requests of users and IT Group
* Define and maintain project activities planning; manage in an efficient/effective way the internal and external resources dedicated/involved in the project



  





**Requirements** 



* Bachelor´s degree in Information Technology, Computer Science, or a related field.
* At least 5 years of experience in IT or a similar role
* Project Management skills and ability to coordinate cross-functional / international teams
* Strong knowledge of SAP ERP / 4 Hana. Other production environments or applications are a plus.
* Strong problem-solving and decision-making abilities.
* Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
* Ability to manage multiple tasks and priorities in a fast-paced environment.
* Basic knowledge of data protection regulations and cybersecurity best practices is a plus.
* Familiarity with IT service management tools and practices ISMS, ITIL, ISO 27001 is a plus.
* Langugae skills Swedish (German nice to have).

title: Network Technician – 3rd level support
description:
*Are you excited by the newest developments in the field of network technology? Do you aspire to be part of a team that delivers the next generation of secure, high-performance networks to enterprise customers across the Nordics? If so, this opportunity is tailor-made for you!*
**About The Role**
 As a Network Technician at GlobalConnect, you'll be joining a Pan-Nordic team responsible for 3rd level operations where we are supporting the future of B2B and B2G network solutions. You will be part of a growing business that offers exposure to innovative technologies and provides a steep learning curve.
   

  

 In this role, you'll focus on troubleshooting and maintaining critical network systems while also working on advanced SD-WAN, firewall, and WiFi platforms like Fortinet, HPE Aruba, Meraki and Versa Networks. You will have the unique opportunity to handle 3rd-level operations, ensuring the ongoing performance of one of Europe’s largest and most complex ISP networks.
   

  

**Here are some examples of key responsibilities during a typical day:**
* Collaborating with our Network Operations and Engineering teams to manage and resolve incidents and escalations.
* Maintaining Layer 2/3 network systems and overseeing SD-WAN services (Underlay, Overlay, Add-On).


 Alongside these responsibilities, you will continuously observe the network's performance, resolve advanced issues, handle alterations in system configuration, and maintain consistent operations to provide continuous service to our clients. You’ll also keep documentation up-to-date and train local Customer Service departments to strengthen their knowledge.
   

  

**Why join us?**
 At GlobalConnect, your work entails more than network upkeep; you'll be contributing to innovative advancements. The role provides a platform to interact with up-and-coming technologies set in a lively and quick-tempo scene, where you'll join forces with a fervent, closely connected team that excels through collaboration. You’ll participate in exciting projects that let you expand your expertise in software-defined networks and gain hands-on experience with advanced security solutions for large-scale networks.
   

  

 We value your development and will provide training to ensure you stay at the forefront of the industry. Your contributions will directly impact public and private sector clients, making you an essential part of our mission to provide high-stability connectivity.
   

  

**To Succeed In This Role, We Believe You Have**
* Deep expertise in Fortinet technologies, including FortiGate FW/SD-WAN routers, FortiExtender 4G/5G modems, FortiSwitch, and FortiAP WiFi APs.
* Solid experience with TCP/IP, Routing & Switching, and SD-WAN services such as Underlay, Overlay, and Add-On.
* Experience with some of the platforms like Meraki, Versa and Aruba
* Familiarity with ITIL and collaboration tools like ServiceNow and MS Teams.
* Fluency in English (both written and spoken) to effectively communicate across our Pan-Nordic team and with customers.


**A security clearance is required for this position, so it is important that you can be approved in the country you're applying for.**
**Excited to take the next step?**
 We are looking for someone who is motivated by the opportunity of working with complex, large-scale networks and is excited about the prospect of becoming an expert in secure overlay networks. If you are interested in making a difference in how enterprises and governments stay connected, we want to hear from you!
   

  

 If you’re excited about this opportunity but don’t meet every single requirement, don’t worry! We’d still love to hear from you.
   

  

**No need for a personal letter** 
 – just send us your CV or LinkedIn profile.
   

  

**About Us**
 GlobalConnect is one of the leading connectivity providers in Northern Europe. We’re 2000 passionate and talented individuals who want to make a difference, turning our customers’ visions into reality through connectivity. Our goal is to create the best possible conditions for engaged employees, a place where you can develop and grow, and create unforgettable memories and enjoyable experiences.
   

  

 We have helped develop and digitize societies across the Nordics for more than two decades. Our purpose is what drives us to continue - turning visions into reality by empowering society with connectivity.

title: Customer Solutions Architect
description:
**Customer Solution Architect – Nätverk** 




 📍
 **Plats:** 
 Stockholm (delvis remote)
 



 📅
 **Start:** 
 18 augusti 2025
 



 ⏳
 **Slut:** 
 31 mars 2026
 



 🌟Möjlighet till förlängning efter mars 2026 finns.
 



 🕒
 **Omfattning:** 
 100 %
 



  





**Konsultuppdraget** 




 Vi söker en
 **Customer Solution Architect – Network** 
 till vårt team inom Hybrid IT Services i Stockholm. Du kommer att vara en nyckelperson i utvecklingen av nätverkslösningar, både i kundprojekt och nyförsäljning.
 



 Rollen passar dig som gillar att jobba nära kund, ta fram tekniska lösningar och driva hela processen – från design till implementation och överlämning till drift.
 



  





**Exempel på arbetsuppgifter** 



* Agera teknisk expert inom nätverk och infrastruktur
* Designa lösningar för LAN, WAN, SD-WAN, Wi-Fi, brandväggar m.m.
* Delta i kundmöten och presentera lösningsförslag
* Samarbeta med interna team och leverantörer
* Dokumentera arkitektur, ritningar och konfigurationsunderlag
* Bidra i upphandlingar och skriva tekniska delar av anbud
* Stötta implementationsteamet
* Hålla dig uppdaterad om nya teknologier och trender







  





**Vi söker dig som har:** 



* Erfarenhet av nätverksdesign, integration och optimering
* Kunskap om hårdvara från t.ex. Cisco, Aruba, Juniper, Palo Alto eller CheckPoint
* God kommunikationsförmåga på
 **svenska och engelska**
* Vana av att jobba kundnära i tekniska projekt
* Förmåga att översätta affärsbehov till tekniska lösningar
* God dokumentationsvana
* Klarar bakgrundskontroll







  





 📍
 **Arbetsplats** 




 Fram till november 2025 kan du jobba från hemmet eller vårt konsultkontor. Därefter förväntas du vara på plats
 **några dagar i veckan** 
 i Stockholm.
 



  





**Om Barona** 








 Barona är en internationell koncern med kontor i 10 länder. I Sverige har vi kontor i Stockholm, Göteborg, Malmö, Falun och Strömsund men levererar lösningar inom kompetensförsörjning över hela landet. Vi erbjuder våra kunder ett visionärt och framtidsanpassat partnerskap och våra medarbetare spännande möjligheter i alla skeden av karriären. Ända sedan starten i Finland 1999, bygger vår framgång på att hela vår organisation är kundorienterad och utmanar traditionellt tänkande när det gäller tjänsteutbud och affärsutveckling. Genom vårt fokus på innovation och digitalisering kan vi ständigt ligga i framkant när det gäller modern rekrytering.

title: IT Print Consultant
description:

 o Print Environment Management

 o Print Driver Management
 



 o LRS VPSX Queue for Special Print Unmanaged Printers

title: IT-tekniker first line support
description:
Till ett uppdrag hos en av våra kunder i Stockholm söker vi nu en IT-tekniker som kommer att sitta på kundens first line support.
 



  





 Som konsult på Centric får du en trygg anställning och samlar på dig värdefull arbetslivserfarenhet på uppdrag hos våra kunder. Din konsultchef stöttar dig i din utveckling där du hela tiden fyller på med nya erfarenheter och kunskaper. En utmärkt möjlighet att göra karriär.
 



  





**Dina arbetsuppgifter** 




 Du kommer att ingå i en grupp där ni kommer att arbeta med att ta emot och lösa ärenden via ett ärendehanteringssystem. Det gäller att kunna sätta sig in i användarnas situation och trivas i rollen för att få kundens miljö att fungera problemfritt. I den här rollen kommer du att erbjudas stora möjligheter att utvecklas och växa inom IT.
 



  





**Din profil och kvalifikationer** 



* Minst 6 månaders erfarenhet inom IT-support
* Telefonvana
* Mycket hög servicekänsla
* Erfarenhet av Windowsmiljö
* Flytande svenska och engelska i tal och skrift



  





*Meriterande* 



* Azure Active Directory
* Microsoft 365
* Relevanta IT-certifieringar
* Mac OS X
* Körkort



  





 Vi ser gärna att du som söker tjänsten i grunden har en data-/IT-/teknisk inriktning på gymnasiet eller annan teknisk utbildning. Vi tror att du är en person som har ett genuint intresse för support. Du är en person som tycker om att finnas till hands för kunden och som har service som prioritering i ditt arbete. Du kan på ett pedagogiskt sätt supporta och vägleda kunder via telefon och mejl.
 



  





 Vi lägger stor vikt vid dina personliga egenskaper.
 



  





**Vad vi erbjuder** 




 Vi hjälper dig att nå dina personliga mål. Vi tycker nämligen att alla våra medarbetare hela tiden ska fortsätta att utvecklas, oavsett om de är juniorer eller har några år på nacken. Därför erbjuder vi alla våra konsulter kvalificerade utbildningar och certifieringar inom den senaste tekniken. Och inte nog med det – du som konsult får även lägga upp en individuell utbildningsplan utifrån dina speciella intresseområden, där vi tar notan för både studiematerial och certifieringar. Hos oss på Centric kommer du snabbt in i gemenskapen genom våra interna och externa aktiviteter där vi träffas och hittar på något roligt tillsammans.
 



  





 Centric är ett IT-företag med 370 anställda, med kontor i Stockholm, Göteborg, Malmö och Linköping. Vi specialiserar oss på uthyrning av generalister och förmedling av specialister samt erbjuder outsourcing och systemlösningar inom retail. Vi är medlem i Almega Kompetensföretagen och följer deras tecknade kollektivavtal med Unionen.

title: IT Director of Infrastructure to Ramirent!
description:
*Do you want to lead and shape the future of IT infrastructure in a transforming international organization? Are you motivated by driving change, building structure, and aligning teams across countries? Then this could be your next leadership challenge at Ramirent. Apply now!*
**Your Workday**
 As IT Director of Infrastructure, you will be part of Ramirent IT with a primary focus on the Nordic region. You report directly to the CIO of Ramirent IT and lead the infrastructure function across multiple countries. This is a senior leadership role with responsibility for several key areas, including infrastructure platforms, end-user services, networks, cloud (Azure), workplace devices, and security services. You will manage a team of service owners and team leaders, with indirect oversight of both internal teams and outsourced vendors.
   

  

 As IT Director of Infrastructure, you will take ownership of the IT infrastructure landscape and contribute to defining the future roadmap in line with Ramirent’s overall IT strategy. This includes understanding upcoming demands, identifying opportunities to introduce new IT solutions, such as AI-enabled capabilities, and ensuring the infrastructure is prepared to support innovation and scale. At the same time, you will lead ongoing initiatives to further harmonize and consolidate infrastructure services, supporting the evolution of Ramirent’s IT operating model.
   

  

 People reporting directly to you will be based in Nordic countries and Estonia. The IT infrastructure strategy, architecture, and technology choices will also apply to Baltics and Poland, Czech and Slovakia in collaboration with their local IT organizations. The general strategy is to be aligned within the Loxam group under the Loxam CIO and CTO.
   

  

***The role is based in Solna, Stockholm. Travelling is entailed in the role.** 
**Your application and resume should be in English. The process for the role will start in august.***
**Who are you?**
**To succeed in the role of Director of Infrastructure, we believe you have:**
* Proven experience from a senior IT leadership role, with responsibility for delivering infrastructure services, including cloud transformation and enterprise architecture
* A strong track record working in large, complex, and international environments
* Solid experience managing outsourcing partnerships and vendor relationships
* Full professional proficiency in English, Swedish is meritorious
* Team management experience to create change and transformation in deliveries as well as ways of working and culture


**As a person,** 
 you are a collaborative and communicative leader who easily builds trust across teams and functions. You are comfortable engaging with both senior management and technical stakeholders, and you navigate complexity with patience and clarity. With a pragmatic mindset and the confidence to make tough decisions, you bring people together and create alignment—even when priorities differ.
   

  

**How do you apply?**
 In this recruitment, Ramirent collaborates with Wise IT. To apply for the position, you simply apply via the link. If you have any questions, please contact the responsible Recruiting Consultant Gustaf Linder, at gustaf.linder@wiseit.se. Unfortunately, we cannot accept applications via email as we value your personal integrity. You can read more about how we handle personal data in accordance with GDPR in the Wise Group's policy for the processing of personal data. We work with an ongoing selection of candidates and may fill the position as soon as we find the right person. Therefore, please submit your application as soon as possible!
   

  

**Will we be a good match?**
 Ramirent is a leading service company in the construction industry and a market leader in machine rental industry. The company's goal is to help customers increase safety and efficiency in the workplace. This is done by delivering the best machine and safety solutions with unbeatable service and knowledge. Ramirent operates in nine countries and is one of Europe's leading companies in machine rental. Ramirent has been part of Loxam Group since 2019, which is the world's third-largest company in machine rental. Read more at: https://www.ramirent.com/.

title: Delivery Lead
company_industry: IT Services and IT Consulting, Professional Services, and Business Consulting and Services
description:
The Delivery Lead role is a critical role within the TEKsystems Global Services (TGS) delivery organization and is responsible for managing one or more projects/engagements at a time A
 



 successful Delivery Lead possesses skillsets for managing people, processes, and issue resolution.
 



 The Delivery function varies in responsibility from account to account, but a successful Delivery Lead is responsible for common activities such as on/off boarding of consultants, reporting and metrics to support Consultant activities and issue resolution. The Delivery Lead provides ownership of Customer expectations, and delivery assurance of associated services, deliverables, and all-round outcomes for Customers. The Delivery Lead is responsible for quantifying the business benefits from the project outcome throughout the engagement.
 



 The responsibilities listed below are not exhaustive, as each account will state their unique
 



 requirements in the Statement of Work (SoW) or as defined with the Account Team at the start of the project. Below are the responsibilities of a Delivery Lead.
 



  





**Key Accountabilities:** 




 Solution Delivery:
 


* Ensure understanding of project vision/SoW deliverables, and any technical requirements as defined by Customer
* Understand SoWs/MSAs and importance of meeting deliverables/expectations of the Customer
* Collaborate with the Account Team to manage risk, project scope, and deliver according to the terms and conditions of our contracts
* Manage revenue tracker for assigned engagement(s)
* Consolidate project status and budget information across projects and/or portfolio of projects
* Consolidate and provide project reporting regarding resources, financials or as requested by the Customer via a Monthly and/or Quarterly Business Reviews (MBR/QBR)
* Identify and coordinate project change control processes
* Perform issue management and facilitate issue resolution with proper notification to all affected parties
* Understand escalation protocol between Consultants, Customers and Account Managers
* Understand timekeeping processes and ensure Consultants are entering their time correctly and on time
* Establish and perform periodic Customer, project, and solution “health checks” baselined against the target metrics associated with the Value Streams defined at the onset of the engagement
* Accountable for project and Customer requirements to maintain Customer relationship and ensure high level of Customer satisfaction
* Ensure customer reference ability and, support and enhance on-going relationships
* Participate in Account Strategy with internal stakeholders relative to project status, opportunities, and imminent risks
* Building and supporting established reporting cadences, status reports and budgetary documentation
* Drive growth by searching for new and improved ways of serving our Customers, collaborating with Solutions and Sales Teams
* Maintain a clear view of the Customer’s current and future business needs above and beyond the engagement deliverables
* Support the identification of opportunities and leads to support Sales pipeline



 Management Responsibilities:
 


* Act as a servant leader in leading/directing delivery activities
* Develop and maintain project related documentation including processes, tools, and procedures
* Understand and manage Customer requirements (deliverables) to ensure contract compliance and Customer satisfaction
* Maintain project artifacts
* Keep internal status and risk reports up-to-date
* Ensure Human Resources policies and procedures are communicated to Consultant staff
* Support of other projects and/or Delivery team members as required



 Resource Management:
 


* Communicate and/or track Consultant requirement details as requested
* Responsible for on-boarding/off-boarding of project Consultants
* Collaborating with Talent Delivery and Account Managers in preparation for STP day
* Issue resolution as needed
* Performance tracking and reporting as requested



  





**Requisite Abilities and/or Skills** 



* Excellent oral and written communication skills (English and Swedish is a must; Spanish or German a plus)
* Analysis and problem-solving skills
* Time management and organizational skills
* Personnel management skills
* Demonstrable project data/ risk analysis and correlation/ mitigation skills
* Excellent Customer service skills
* Can prioritize and manage own work, with management support



  





**Basic Qualifications and Experience** 



* Bachelor’s Degree or equivalent, relevant experience
* 2+ years in IT service management/project management providing project and delivery management and daily operational oversight within a technology professional services environment or equivalent.
* Experience in traditional and agile project management methodologies preferred
* IT Experience: Delivery Team Member, Customer Success Manager, Project Manager, Business Analyst, QA, Developer, Scrum Master, or other

title: IT-tekniker 3rd line support
description:
Centric har just nu flera kunder i Stockholm som är i behov av supporttekniker på 3rd line nivå.
 



  





 Som konsult på Centric får du en trygg anställning och samlar på dig värdefull arbetslivserfarenhet på uppdrag hos våra kunder. Din konsultchef stöttar dig i din utveckling där du hela tiden fyller på med nya erfarenheter och kunskaper. En utmärkt möjlighet att göra karriär.
 



  





**Dina arbetsuppgifter** 




 Som tekniker på 3rd line arbetar du bland annat med systemförbättringar, drift och underhåll av operativsystem och produktapplikationer i olika IT-miljöer.
 



 Dessutom hjälper du till med nyinstallationer, uppgraderingar och andra typer av förbättringsarbeten.
 



  





**Din profil och kvalifikationer** 




 För att lyckas i din roll som tekniker inom 3rd line / senior IT-tekniker har du en naturlig känsla för service och trivs med att arbeta kvalitativt och långsiktigt. Du gillar att arbeta både individuellt samt som en del i en grupp. Du är väl införstådd med vikten av processer och dokumentation. Du är lyhörd samt utrustad med ett riktigt starkt driv. Det faller sig naturligt för dig att se effektiviserings- och förbättringsmöjligheter och du har ett brinnande tekniskt intresse. Du har erfarenhet av drift och support, och vi ser gärna att du drivit olika förändringsprojekt tidigare.
 



  





 Vi lägger stor vikt vid dina personliga egenskaper.
 



  





*Krav:* 



* 3-5 års arbetslivserfarenhet av liknande arbetsuppgifter
* Windows Server (Infrastruktur samt inbyggda funktioner)
* Powershell, VB script
* Microsoft Office365
* Erfarenhet av installation, drift, felsökning, underhåll av större Windows server miljöer
* Erfarenhet av installation, drift, felsökning, underhåll av 3:e parts applikationer på Windows
* Mycket goda kunskaper i svenska och engelska i tal och skrift.



  





*Meriterande:* 



* Microsoft SQL-server
* Microsoft Azure
* Microsoft Exchange
* Server virtualisering (VMware eller HyperV)
* Citrix/Cisco produkter
* Kunskap och erfarenhet av lagringslöningar
* Klientmanagering
* Kunskap och erfarenhet av arbete enligt ITIL
* Certifieringar från Microsoft eller andra relevanta certifieringar
* Körkort B
* Högskoleutbildning med teknisk inriktning eller annan utbildning och erfarenhet som vi anser likvärdig



  





*LÅTER DET INTRESSANT?* 




 Vi hanterar ansökningar löpande så registrera din ansökan redan idag.
 



  





**Vad vi erbjuder** 




 På Centric får du de verktyg du behöver för att nå dina mål. Vi erbjuder alla våra konsulter kvalificerade utbildningar och certifieringar inom den senaste tekniken. Vi sätter stort värde på att våra medarbetare hela tiden ska fortsätta att utvecklas. Därför erbjuder vi dig möjligheten att lägga upp en individuell utbildningsplan, där vi bekostar såväl studiematerial som själva certifieringarna. Under din utveckling kommer vi matcha din kompetens mot rätt uppdrag i takt med att du avancerar. Vi genomför regelbundet spännande och roliga aktiviteter där du som konsult får möjlighet att träffa och umgås med dina kollegor under trevliga och avslappnande former.
 



  





*Mer om oss* 




 Centric är ett IT-företag med 370 anställda, och med kontor i Stockholm, Göteborg, Malmö och Linköping. Vi specialiserar oss på uthyrning av generalister och förmedling av specialister samt erbjuder outsourcing och systemlösningar inom retail. Vi är medlem i Almega Kompetensföretagen och följer deras kollektivavtal med Unionen.

title: Systemadministratör inom Windows
description:
Nu söker vi på Centric efter flera systemadministratörer inom Windows till flera av våra kunder i Stockholmområdet. Vill du bidra med din expertis inom Windows-servrar och klienter, din förmåga att dokumentera och göra systemkonfigurationer hos våra kunder? Då är det dig vi söker!
 



  





 Som konsult på Centric får du en trygg anställning och samlar på dig värdefull arbetslivserfarenhet på uppdrag hos våra kunder. Din konsultchef stöttar dig i din utveckling där du hela tiden fyller på med nya erfarenheter och kunskaper. En utmärkt möjlighet att göra karriär.
 



  





**Dina arbetsuppgifter** 




 I rollen som systemadministratör kommer arbetsuppgifterna variera beroende på vilken av våra spännande kunder du kommer arbeta hos. Sammantaget kommer du arbeta med det du gör bäst, administrera, hantera och underhålla Windows och Office365-miljön. Du kommer också arbeta för att säkerhetställa en stabil och säker infrastruktur efter verksamhetens behov.
 



  





*I rollen kommer du att arbeta med följande:* 



* Administrera och underhålla Windows-servrar och klienter
* Hantera användarkonton, grupper och behörigheter i Active Directory
* Underhålla och optimera O365-miljön
* Övervaka systemprestanda
* Felsöka och supportera användare vid behov
* Dokumentera och genomföra systemkonfigurationer



  





**Din profil och kvalifikationer** 




 För att lyckas i rollen är du en erfaren och motiverad person som på ett ansvarsfullt vis gärna tar ägandeskap över dina arbetsuppgifter. Vi ser gärna att du trivs i att arbeta i dynamiska team där du bidrar med flexiblitet och goda kommunikativa egenskaper.
 



  





*Krav* 



* Minst 3 års erfarenhet som systemadministratör i Windowsmiljö
* Mycket goda kunskaper kring Windows server, Active Directory och GPO
* Erfarenhet av Office365, inklusive Exchange och Sharepoint
* God förståelse för nätverkskonfiguration och felsökning
* Erfarenhet av säkerhetslösningar, så som brandväggar och backup-system
* Talar och skriver obehindrat på både svenska och engelska



*Meriterande* 



* Certifieringar inom området
* Tidigare arbetat i IT-projekt rörande IT-processer



 Vi lägger stor vikt vid dina personliga egenskaper.
 



  





 Vad vi erbjuder
 



 På Centric får du de verktyg du behöver för att nå dina mål. Vi erbjuder alla våra konsulter kvalificerade utbildningar och certifieringar inom den senaste tekniken. Vi tycker nämligen att våra medarbetare hela tiden ska fortsätta att utvecklas. Därför erbjuder vi dig möjligheten att lägga upp en individuell utbildningsplan, där vi bekostar såväl studiematerial som själva certifieringarna. Under din utveckling kommer vi matcha din kompetens mot rätt uppdrag i takt med att du avancerar. Vi genomför regelbundet spännande aktiviteter där du som konsult får möjlighet att träffa och umgås med dina kollegor under roliga och avslappnande former.
 



*Mer om oss* 




 Centric är ett IT-företag med 370 anställda, med kontor i Stockholm, Göteborg, Malmö och Linköping. Vi specialiserar oss på uthyrning av generalister och förmedling av specialister samt erbjuder outsourcing och systemlösningar inom retail. Vi är medlem i Almega Kompetensföretagen och följer deras tecknade kollektivavtal med Unionen.

title: M365 Solution Architect
company_industry: Information Technology & Services, IT System Custom Software Development, and Software Development
description:
Company: US3 Consulting
 



 About Company: US3 Consulting is a leading European IT recruitment agency dedicated to connecting top tech talent with innovative companies across the continent. With decades of experience and a fresh approach, we specialize in rapid, cost-effective candidate sourcing across all tech industry sectors. Our expert consultants are committed to building strong, productive relationships, ensuring the perfect fit between candidates and employers.
 



  





 Job Title: M365 Solution Architect
 



 Total Experience Required: 6+ years in Information Technology/Computers/Software
 



 Relevant Experience Required: 2+ years in Microsoft 365 architecture and implementation
 



 Job Type: Contract
 



 Contract Duration: A minimum duration of 3 to 6 months, with the possibility of extension up to 18 months or beyond, depending on project requirements.
 



 Workplace Type: Hybrid (at least 3 times a week at office)
 



 Languages Required: English, Swedish is a plus
 



 Visa/Work Authorization Status: Candidates must hold a valid work permit or visa to work in Sweden
 



 Work Location: Stockholm, Sweden
 


1. Must be currently based in Sweden or
2. Willing to relocate to Sweden from anywhere within Europe or the UK

 About Client: Client offers a dynamic environment where innovation and professional growth are at the forefront. With a strong emphasis on continuous learning, the company provides employees access to extensive training programs, including LinkedIn Learning and an Education Assistance Program.
 







 The company champions a balanced work-life culture, promoting flexible work hours and a supportive atmosphere that values diversity and inclusion. As a part of the esteemed group, it combines global opportunities with a commitment to employee well-being, making it an ideal workplace for those seeking both professional excellence and personal fulfillment.
 



  





 We are currently seeking an experienced M365 Solution Architect for a contract role based in Stockholm, Sweden. This is a client-facing position offering the opportunity to contribute to high-impact Office 365 solutions within a dynamic enterprise environment.
 



  





**Key Responsibilities**

**Essential Skills**

**Optional Skills**

 Interested? Apply Now!

title: Quality Assurance Manager
company_industry: Transportation, Logistics, Supply Chain and Storage
description:
This role will be based in Stockholm. This is a role for an experienced Quality Assurance Manager within the
 **logistics Industry** 
 - Sweden.
 


  


 Applicants must have permission to reside and work in Sweden.
 


  

  

  


**About the Company** 



  

  

  

  

  


 Be part of a forward-thinking logistics provider specialising in mission-critical IT infrastructure delivery. We are committed to operational excellence, innovation, and delivering exceptional service to our clients. Join us and take the lead in shaping a zero-defect, high-performance logistics environment. Crane Worldwide logistics is a global leader delivering mission-critical server infrastructure with a commitment to excellence, safety, and customer satisfaction. At the forefront of technical logistics, we empower our teams to set the standard in quality and operational safety across EMEIA.
 


  

  

  

  

  


**About the Role** 



  

  

  

  

  


 We are seeking a highly skilled and detail-oriented Quality and Assurance Manager Logistics to oversee the end-to-end quality control processes related to the logistics, handling, and delivery of server racks and associated IT infrastructure. This role plays a key part in maintaining high standards in service quality, damage prevention, compliance with ISO and GDP standards, and continuous improvement across our logistics operations. The Quality Assurance Manager-logistics will be responsible for the quality management program and ongoing maintenance/adherence to said program relating to cloud services including supporting the operations management to ensure compliance with operating procedures and client needs.
 


  

  

  

  

  


**Responsibilities** 



  

  

  

  

  

  
* **Quality Management System (QMS):**
  
* Develop, implement, and maintain QMS aligned with ISO 9001 and relevant
 **logistics** 
 /IT infrastructure quality standards.
  
* Ensure all operations related to the transport and delivery of server racks adhere to internal and customer-defined quality standards.
  
* Conduct weekly reviews to ensure quality is being maintained and review with Operations Manager.
  
* Establish Quality Operations and Quality Control function at given location, including assisting in hiring, developing, and conducting training.
  
* Determine process validation and maintenance of controlled requirements. This process to be documented and retained based on good documentation processes as established.
  
* Partner with relevant internal and external teams to compliance. To be reviewed weekly.
  
* Inspection processes and to ensure those inspections are commensurate with the associated level of risk.
  
* Work with Operations Management as needed to achieve root cause corrective action.
  
* Develops and analyzes reports to monitor and evaluate quality performance in meeting established goals related to the quality management work plan and contractual requirements.
  
* Coordinates guidelines, studies, and performance improvement activities in concert with the utilization management, quality management, case management and device management programs.
  
* Assists in the tracking and monitoring of processes for quality improvement activities according to regulatory requirements, policies and procedures, and contractual agreements.
  
* Provides regular feedback and support to staff in meeting performance expectations.
  
* Prepares, compiles, reviews, and submits monthly and quarterly reports to the leadership team.
  
* Participate in internal and external audits as a subject matter expert on quality operations and quality control functions.
  
* Identify problems, and propose resolutions that are timely, cost-effective, and meet quality requirements.
  
* All other duties as assigned.
  


  

  

  

  
* **Operational Quality Assurance:**
  
* Monitor and audit warehouse and transport processes to ensure safe handling of high-value IT equipment.
  
* Establish and enforce packaging, loading, and unloading standards to minimize transit damage or contamination.
  
* Track damage rates, non-conformities, and corrective/preventive actions (CAPA).
  


  

  

  

  
* **Supplier and Vendor Oversight:**
  
* Collaborate with transport providers, subcontractors, and warehouse teams to ensure consistent quality in handling and delivery performance.
  
* Evaluate and audit logistics partners for adherence to SLAs and quality KPIs.
  


  

  

  

  
* **Customer Satisfaction and Reporting:**
  
* Address customer quality and safety concerns and lead root cause analysis and resolution plans.
  
* Provide regular performance and compliance reports to internal stakeholders and clients.
  


  

  

  

  
* **Training and Development:**
  
* Train warehouse and logistics staff on quality procedures, handling standards, and escalation protocols.
  
* Promote a quality-focused culture across all touchpoints in the delivery process.
  


  

  

  

  
* **Safety and Compliance:**
  
* Champion safety protocols in warehousing, transportation, and delivery activities, ensuring alignment with local health & safety regulations, EU standards, and internal HSE policies.
  
* Perform risk assessments and enforce safe loading/unloading procedures for high-value IT hardware.
  
* Ensure full compliance with GDP (Good Distribution Practice) and relevant regulatory standards for server rack distribution.
  
* Oversee proper use of personal protective equipment (PPE) and ensure logistics partners and employees adhere to all HSE requirements.
  
* Maintain safety audit schedules and lead incident investigations related to logistics operations.
  


  

  

  


**Safety Requirements:** 



  

  
* In-depth knowledge of HSE regulations, logistics risk management, and warehouse safety practices.
  
* Experience with manual handling guidelines, equipment safety, and secure transit standards for IT infrastructure.
  
* Ability to lead incident investigations and implement immediate containment and long-term prevention measures.
  
* Understanding of environmental and occupational safety standards applicable to international logistics.
  
* Certification in health & safety management (e.g., NEBOSH, IOSH, or equivalent) is highly desirable.
  


  

  

  


**Qualifications** 



  

  
* 5 years of supervisory experience.
  
* Bachelor's degree in Logistics, Supply Chain, Engineering, Occupational Safety, or a related field.
  
* Minimum 5 years’ experience in quality and/or safety assurance within logistics or technical goods delivery.
  
* Proven expertise in ISO 9001, GDP standards, and warehouse safety protocols.
  
* Six Sigma certification or experience in continuous improvement methodologies is advantageous.
  
* Strong interpersonal and communication skills to engage frontline staff, contractors, and senior stakeholders internal and external.
  
* Fluent in English; additional European languages a plus.

title: Junior Accountant EMEA/APJ
company_industry: Technology, Information and Internet, IT Services and IT Consulting, and Computer and Network Security
description:
Meet
 
 Yubico
 
 : the inventor of the
 
 YubiKey
 
 ––the world's first and leading security key. Our company’s mission is to make secure login easy and available for everyone. Yubico was founded in 2007 by Stina and Jakob Ehrensvard, and recently went public on Nasdaq Stockholm Main Market: YUBICO. Our customers include Fortune 500 companies, hundreds of government agencies and millions of individuals in over 160 countries that rely on Yubico technology to secure access to computers, online services and mobile apps. We  are a global company with a strong company culture and employees located in over 14 countries. Yubico’s  headquarters are based in  Stockholm, Sweden and Santa Clara, CA.  Aligned with our mission to make the internet more secure for everyone, Yubico donates YubiKeys to organizations helping at-risk individuals through our philanthropic initiative,
 
 Secure it Forward
 
 .
 




  





**At Yubico, we offer:**




  





**Yubico Values:
 
 We work to ensure that our employees have an open space to have their voices amplified to create a workplace where everyone feels like they belong. Aligned with this, our employees have created some pretty cool Employee Resource Groups: YubiPride, YubiBIPOC, YubiSustainability and YubiWomen. Additionally, Yubico donates YubiKeys to organizations in need all over the world (you can read more about our work here).
 

  





**Social Connection:**

 Relationships and connectedness matter, and we love spending time with our team! Our virtual workspace keeps us connected day-to-day whether it's through Yubico celebrating wins or our buzzing Slack communities. We host an all-team event in a new location every year where we plan for upcoming quarters, set goals, and most importantly, host fun events to encourage team building outside of the workplace. Check out our
 

 Life at Yubico Page
 

 on LinkedIn and our awards
 

 here
 
**.**




  






 The Role:
 




  






 As a Junior Accountant in the EMEA/APJ finance team, you will be involved in a wide range of day-to-day accounting activities, supporting both our Swedish parent company and our German subsidiary. This is a hands-on role with room to grow, offering exposure to international accounting and close collaboration with teams across the organization. You’ll join a supportive and collaborative team where curiosity, structure, and a willingness to learn are highly valued.
 





  




**Tasks & Responsibilities:** 
* Handle daily accounting tasks such as:
* Booking vendor (accounts payable) and customer (accounts receivable) invoices
* Managing incoming and outgoing payments
* Assisting with VAT reporting and payroll-related bookings
* Supporting monthly reconciliations and accruals
* Perform similar tasks for our German subsidiary
* Collaborate with the broader finance team during monthly close
* Participate in cross-regional meetings with colleagues in the US



  




**Basic Requirements:** 
* 1 year of experience in accounting, preferably in accounts payable
* Familiarity with VAT and payroll-related accounting (e.g. vacation pay liability, social security contributions) is a plus
* Vocational education or equivalent post-secondary training in accounting or finance
* Comfortable working in both Swedish and English, written and spoken
* Experience with NetSuite or similar ERP system is a plus
* Strong attention to detail and well-organized
* Team player with a generous and curious mindset
* Eagerness to learn and grow within the role



  




**Terms:** 
* Start Date: As soon as possible
* Location: Stockholm






  




  














  





 We are an equal opportunity employer, we value diversity and uphold an inclusive environment where all people feel that they are equally respected and valued. All applicants will be considered for employment without attention to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, age, marital status, religion, national origin, disability, protected Veteran status or any other characteristic protected by law. We'd love to learn about what you can add to our diverse team.
 



  





 Yubico does not accept agency resumes or referrals so please do not send them to our careers staff or employees. Yubico is not responsible for any fees related to unsolicited resumes or referrals.
 



  





 Personal data submitted through this form is used for managing Yubico’s recruitment activities, which include facilitating any application you make, setting up and conducting interviews and tests for applicants, evaluating and assessing results and selecting candidates, and as otherwise needed in our recruitment and onboarding processes. The use of your personal data may also be necessary prior to entering into a contract with you (that is prior to offering you a job with Yubico). Your personal data will only be used for the purposes for which it was collected and in accordance with the Yubico Privacy Notice. We only keep your personal data for as long as necessary and in compliance with Yubico’s record retention policies. If you have asked us to, we will keep you informed of other opportunities at Yubico. We do this in various ways, including email and by phone. If at any time you do not want us to contact you or use your information as described herein please contact us at jobs@yubico.com to let us know and we will delete all such information. Providing your personal data is voluntary, but necessary to join our talent community, and if you do not agree to provide your data, we will not be able to consider you as part of our talent community.
 



  





 As part of providing the requested service, we will transfer your data to be processed by Lever, Inc., a service provider contracted by Yubico AB and/or its subsidiaries that meets legally mandated privacy requirements. The Yubico Privacy Notice offers more information about Yubico privacy practices, including the lawful basis for processing of personal data, how to lodge a complaint with the supervisory authority, and how to contact Yubico to exercise your data subject rights. In this notice, when we refer to "Yubico", "us", "we" or "our", we mean the Yubico group company or companies that you apply to, or correspond with, and which are responsible for any personal data collected about you.**

title: Document Controller- Construction Projects
company_industry: Construction, Civil Engineering, and Business Consulting and Services
description:

That means delivering better outcomes for our clients, helping our people to realize their potential, and doing our part to create a prosperous society.  Twitter
   

  

 Instagram
   

  

 LinkedIn

title: Erfaren IT-tekniker 1st line support
description:
Till ett uppdrag hos en av våra kunder i Stockholm söker vi dig som arbetat några år i en servicedesk och vill utvecklas vidare.
 



  





 Som konsult på Centric får du självklart en trygg anställning och samlar på dig värdefull arbetslivserfarenhet på uppdrag hos våra kunder. Din konsultchef stöttar dig i din utveckling där du hela tiden fyller på med nya erfarenheter och kunskaper. En utmärkt möjlighet att göra karriär.
 



  





**Dina arbetsuppgifter** 




 Du kommer att arbeta som supporttekniker där du kommer att ta emot ärenden via telefon och ett ärendehanteringssystem men du kommer även att supportera användare på plats. Du kommer att arbeta med felsökning av datorer, telefoner, utskrifter och applikationer samt ha hand om leveranser av IT-utrustning. Du kommer bland annat att hantera användare i Active Directory och Microsoft 365 samt ge support via fjärrstyrning.
 



  





**Din profil och kvalifikationer** 




 Vi ser gärna att du har ett genuint intresse för teknik och att ge support. Du är ansvarstagande och driven med ett professionellt agerande; du tycker om att vara behjälplig och vill alltid ge kunden en bra kundupplevelse.
 



  





 Vidare ser vi även att du på ett pedagogiskt sätt kan ge support och vägleda användare, du ska ha förmågan att kunna ta fram en beskrivning av ”helheten” i ett problem genom att ställa relevanta frågor för att på så sätt underlätta felsökningen för teknikerna som ärendet eskaleras vidare till.
 



  





*Krav* 



* Minst 2 års erfarenhet av att ha arbetat som supporttekniker
* Erfarenhet av att ha arbetat med Active Directory
* Erfarenhet av att ha arbetat med Windows
* Erfarenhet av att ha felsökt hård- och mjukvara
* Flytande svenska och engelska, i tal och skrift



  





**Vad vi erbjuder** 




 På Centric får du de verktyg du behöver för att nå dina mål. Vi erbjuder alla våra konsulter kvalificerade utbildningar och certifieringar inom den senaste tekniken. Vi tycker nämligen att våra medarbetare hela tiden ska fortsätta att utvecklas. Därför erbjuder vi dig möjligheten att lägga upp en individuell utbildningsplan, där vi bekostar såväl studiematerial som själva certifieringarna. Under din utveckling kommer vi matcha din kompetens mot rätt uppdrag i takt med att du avancerar. Vi genomför regelbundet spännande aktiviteter där du som konsult får möjlighet att träffa och umgås med dina kollegor under roliga och avslappnande former.
 



  





*Mer om oss* 




 Centric är ett IT-företag med 370 anställda och med kontor i Stockholm, Göteborg, Malmö och Linköping. Vi specialiserar oss på uthyrning av generalister och förmedling av specialister samt erbjuder outsourcing och systemlösningar inom retail. Vi är medlem i Almega Kompetensföretagen och följer deras tecknade kollektivavtal med Unionen.

title: Utveckla din IT-karriär hos Centric!
description:
Vi söker engagerade supporttekniker till flera av våra kunder. Har du tidigare arbetat något år inom IT eller är du nyexaminerad från gymnasiet med erfarenhet av praktik inom IT och nu redo att komma ut i arbetslivet? Är du som person serviceinriktad, gillar att vara social i arbetet och har ett stort intresse för IT, datorer och nätverk? Då är du av stort intresse för oss!
 



 När du anställs hos oss ser vi en långsiktighet hos dig, vilket innebär att du kommer axla flera olika uppdrag hos oss. När du väl har arbetat hos oss på Centric i 2-3 år har du möjligheten att växa och ta ytterligare ett steg i din yrkeskarriär tillsammans med oss.
 



  





 Som konsult på Centric får du en trygg anställning och samlar på dig värdefull arbetslivserfarenhet på uppdrag hos våra kunder. Din konsultchef stöttar dig i din utveckling där du hela tiden fyller på med nya erfarenheter och kunskaper. En utmärkt möjlighet att göra karriär.
 



  





**Dina arbetsuppgifter** 




 Du kommer att inta rollen som first line supporttekniker tillsammans med ett team. Som supporttekniker arbetar du med både mail och telefonkommunikation. I rollen ingår det även att registrera samt ta emot inkommande ärenden i ett ärendehanteringssystem. Du kommer bland annat att hantera användare i Active Directory och Microsoft 365 samt ge support via fjärrstyrning.
 



  





**Din profil och kvalifikationer** 




 Som person ser vi att du är social, lösningsorienterad och har ett genuint intresse för teknik. Du är självgående och tar egna initiativ samt vill ständigt utvecklas. Du motiveras av att ge bra service och har en god kommunikativ förmåga. Du talar och skriver svenska och engelska flytande.
 



  





*Krav:* 



* Minst 6 månaders erfarenhet av praktisk IT-support
* Gått IT-gymnasium eller kurser inom IT
* God känsla för service
* God teknisk kunskap



  





*Meriterande* 



* Active Directory
* Office 365
* Microsoft 365
* Windows operativsystem



  





 Vi lägger stor vikt vid dina personliga egenskaper.
 



  





**Vad vi erbjuder** 




 På Centric får du de verktyg du behöver för att nå dina mål. Vi erbjuder alla våra konsulter kvalificerade utbildningar och certifieringar inom den senaste tekniken. Vi tycker nämligen att våra medarbetare hela tiden ska fortsätta att utvecklas. Därför erbjuder vi dig möjligheten att lägga upp en individuell utbildningsplan, där vi bekostar såväl studiematerial som själva certifieringarna. Under din utveckling kommer vi matcha din kompetens mot rätt uppdrag i takt med att du avancerar. Vi genomför regelbundet spännande aktiviteter där du som konsult får möjlighet att träffa och umgås med dina kollegor under roliga och avslappnande former.
 



  





 Centric är ett IT-företag med 370 anställda, med kontor i Stockholm, Göteborg, Malmö och Linköping. Vi specialiserar oss på uthyrning av generalister och förmedling av specialister samt erbjuder outsourcing och systemlösningar inom retail. Vi är medlem i Almega Kompetensföretagen och följer deras tecknade kollektivavtal med Unionen.

title: Quality & Test Engineer - Stockholm
description:
ASSA ABLOY Global Solutions Hospitality is now looking for a Quality & Test Engineer to join our R&D department in Stockholm! This role is crucial to bridging our geographically distributed teams, especially between Stockholm and Landskrona, ensuring consistent software quality practices across the Vostio product line. The role includes hands-on coaching, and collaborative tasks, as well as combines testing expertise with strong interpersonal and communication skills to improve test processes, support developers, and elevate the quality culture.
   

  

 Join our Team in this Stockholm, Sweden and enjoy a collaborative culture that empowers you to build a career you can be proud of.
   

  

  

  

**What would you do as our Quality & Test Engineer**
 Act as the Stockholm-based "QA ambassador", working closely with teams in Landskrona, (Sweden), Ski (Norway), and Krakow (Poland) to align expectations, share practices, and support unified quality assurance approaches across teams.
   

  

 You would also:
   

  

* Serve as a “boots-on-the-ground” representative of the test team in Stockholm, providing real-time support to local developers and facilitating smoother upstream testing coordinating testing efforts and follow up on test activities.
* Identify and drive opportunities to shift testing earlier in the development cycle and increase automation, especially in areas currently relying on manual efforts.
* Help debug and interpret build failures, read stack traces, and proactively work with developers to resolve issues, especially around failed test pipelines.
* Ensure QA-related metrics (e.g., test coverage, pipeline pass rate) are visualized on dashboards and available for team insights and follow-up.
* Participate in and contribute to the QA Competence Forum and help spread knowledge, tools, and good practices across teams.
* Provide strategic input to improve long-term testing and quality assurance capabilities Provide hands-on support with the AEM platform, including train and support for local content teams in localization, publishing, best practices, by utilizing its capabilities (components, page types, etc.) to the fullest.


**The Skills And Experience You Need**
 We are looking for someone who:
   

  

* Has solid understanding of test processes, pipelines (e.g., GitLab CI), and modern QA tools and frameworks.
* Has experience with at least some of the following tools is a plus: Playwright, PACT, JUnit, Gherkin, Robot Framework, Zephyr, Jira, Confluence.
* Has proven experience in software testing, preferably in mixed environments involving embedded systems (for example RS485 and Zigbee HW) and cloud based systems (AWS).
* Has basic understanding of programming and ability to read logs, stack traces, and CI/CD outputs. Direct coding experience is a bonus.
* Is fluent in English (spoken and written), Swedish is a plus.


 Familiarity with networked systems, radio communication, and embedded software integration is beneficial, as well as ISTQB certification (or former ISEB).
   

  

 We are looking for someone with excellent communication skills and a team player mindset, who is solution-oriented, adaptable, and curious – someone who enjoys working across disciplines and solving practical problems. We need a person that has strong ability to collaborate and communicate with both local and remote developers and testers, and has a sense of ownership and accountability, with a drive to ensure robust, automated, and scalable testing. If you’re able to build trust and foster collaboration between geographically distributed teams, we may be looking for you!
   

  

**What We Offer**
 We’re passionate about providing amazing opportunities and benefits, so you can continue and progress a lifelong career with us – here’s what we have to offer:
   

  

* Learning and career development opportunities, whether it’s online learning, management training or enhancing your skills.
* Hybrid model of working.
* A competitive salary and incentive schemes.
* Flexible working hours.
* Stable employment in a friendly international atmosphere.


  

  

**We review applications regularly, so don’t wait**
 We are building diverse, inclusive teams, and encourage applications from everyone who can see themselves working with us. Just set up your profile and apply here!
   

  

  

  

 To make sure your personal data is safe, we don’t look at any applications sent by email or post. If you have any questions about the role or the process, email Daria Skucha at Daria.Skucha@assaabloy.com.
   

  

 Let’s create a safer and more open world - together!
   

  

 To find out more about us, visit www.assaabloy.com
   

  

**We are the ASSA ABLOY Group**
 Our people have made us the global leader in access solutions. In return, we open doors for them wherever they go. With nearly 63,000 colleagues in more than 70 different countries, we help billions of people experience a more open world. Our innovations make all sorts of spaces – physical and virtual – safer, more secure, and easier to access.
   

  

 As an employer, we value results – not titles, or backgrounds. We empower our people to build their career around their aspirations and our ambitions – supporting them with regular feedback, training, and development opportunities. Our colleagues think broadly about where they can make the most impact, and we encourage them to grow their role locally, regionally, or even internationally.
   

  

 As we welcome new people on board, it’s important to us to have diverse, inclusive teams, and we value different perspectives and experiences.

title: Senior Network Engineer
company_industry: Telecommunications and IT Services and IT Consulting
description:
Are you a network professional looking for a new challenge? I'm Zahed Iqbal, and I'm searching for a curious individual like you, ready to leave a lasting mark. Join our team, where your skills will thrive, and together - let's make better happen!
   

  

 Data Center Networks Team is responsible for the development, operations, maintenance, life cycle management and capacity planning of Datacenter network infrastructures. The team is in Infrastructure and Data unit which is developing, maintaining, and operating our Datacenters' IT infrastructure and internal platforms (private cloud, integration). It plays a key role in delivering production quality and customer experience for continued growth in Telia Company.
   

  

**As a Senior Network Engineer…**
 You will be responsible for overseeing the technical design, architecture, development, maintenance, and operation of cloud-ready data center networks. You’ll work closely with engineering and development teams within the Infrastructure and Data unit to build common cloud and compute infrastructure. You will utilize automation frameworks and tools for network programming, as well as collaborating with developers and IT teams to integrate and automate network infrastructure and services.
   

  

 You will ensure seamless integration of both public and private cloud infrastructure with data center networks and maintain a highly available, scalable, and reliable network while monitoring performance, forecasting capacity needs, and managing the network lifecycle. Additionally, you will evaluate and recommend new technologies and tools to enhance the efficiency and effectiveness of the network and cloud infrastructure.
   

  

**Who We're Looking For...**
 Someone proficient in network operating systems, including Cisco ACI, IOS, IOS XR, and NXOS, and demonstrated experience working in complex, large-scale data center environments. Strong expertise in routing, switching, and network security is essential.
   

  

 Experience with Cisco switches and routers, including software and hardware upgrades, patching, and troubleshooting. Proven ability to deliver both high-level and low-level network design, particularly within data center environments, is also needed.
   

  

 The position also requires familiarity with network programming and automation tools, such as Python, Terraform. Knowledge of one or more cloud platforms (such as AWS, Azure, GCP).
   

  

**We are more than a workplace**
 Join our inclusive team and collaborate with over 15,000 talented colleagues from around the globe. Recognized as a Climate Leader in the Nordics and Baltics, we're passionate about creating great products and delivering extraordinary customer experiences while always prioritizing sustainability. We believe our people are our most valuable asset, ensuring everyone feels welcome and valued. When you join us, you'll receive a comprehensive benefits package tailored to your local market. You'll also have the chance to earn an annual bonus based on your performance and Telia's results. If you want to make a real impact, this is the place where you belong.
   

  

*(Monthly salary range for this position: 4200 - 6400 EUR before tax deduction. This range is applicable for candidates based in Lithuania).*
**Ready to make better happen?**
 We are looking forward to your application by 2025-08-19. If you are selected for the next stage in the process, you'll be contacted by our Talent Acquisition Partner. Required controls will be performed.
   

  

 If you want to know more about this position, please contact me at zahed.iqbal@teliacompany.com or on LinkedIn.
   

  

**Join us and let’s make better happen – together!**

title: SAP Project Manager
description:
**Job Title:** 
 SAP Project Manager – Senior
 



**Work Location:** 
 Solna, Stockholm, Sweden
 







**Role Description:** 




 We are seeking a highly experienced
 **SAP Project Manager (Senior Level)** 
 to lead a critical implementation based on
 **SAP ACTIVATE methodology** 
 . The ideal candidate will have a strong background in SAP project delivery, excellent stakeholder management skills, and the ability to manage complex projects from design to closure.
 



  





**Key Responsibilities:** 



* Oversee and manage IT project aspects, including
 **objectives, budget, timeline, quality, and scope** 
 .
* Translate stakeholder requirements into project plans and deliverables.
* Lead project design: define resource commitments, objectives, and expected outcomes.
* Develop and maintain comprehensive project plans and schedules.
* Manage
 **contracting** 
 for any work outsourced to third parties.
* Maintain full
 **budget ownership** 
 and control.
* Drive end-to-end project management including risk assessment, quality control, and communication plans.
* Ensure timely
 **project closure** 
 with documented results and lessons learned.
* Lead
 **resource planning and management** 
 , ensuring effective team coordination and performance monitoring.



  





**Required Competencies & Experience:** 



* **10+ years of experience** 
 in IT project management, particularly in SAP programs.
* Expertise in
 **SAP Project Management using SAP ACTIVATE methodology** 
 .
* Proven track record of leading large-scale, end-to-end SAP implementations.
* Strong understanding of various SAP technologies and modules.
* Demonstrated ability to manage multi-stakeholder environments and drive complex projects to success.
* Excellent communication, leadership, and organizational skills.
* Ability to operate with limited supervision and manage multiple priorities effectively.



  





**Technical & Functional Skills:** 



* **SAP Activate methodology**
* Project lifecycle and SDLC understanding
* Budget and financial oversight
* Technical currency – broad knowledge of technologies used in enterprise environments
* Excellent documentation and reporting skills



**Desirable Qualifications:** 



* Prior SAP project management experience in Europe or specifically Sweden
* Experience working with global and cross-functional teams
* PMP or Prince2 certification (preferred but not mandatory)

title: Head of Support & Technical Account Manager
job_function: Customer Service, Project Management, and Information Technology
description:
**Om bolaget** 




 ”Vi på Flowscape skapar, genom vår IT-lösning, en effektivare arbetsdag på kontoret samt optimerar nyttjandet av kontorsytorna.”
 



  





 Produkterna ligger väl positionerade mot de nya behov man ser efter pandemin. Enligt många undersökningar kommer medarbetare över hela världen att vilja fortsätta arbeta ett antal dagar i veckan hemifrån. De vill komma in till kontoret för kreativt teamarbete och social samvaro.
